Perms.SendMessagesInThreads: Send Messages in Threads and Posts

errorHandler.alreadyReported:
This error has already been reported. {link}.
It will be fixed soon.
errorHandler.discordAPIErr: A Discord API Error occurred, please try again and message a developer if this keeps happening.
errorHandler.embedFooterText: Reporting this error will send the command options privately to the developers.

getCommands.lookAtOptionDesc: SLASH Command: Look at the option descriptions.

birthday.unknownChannel: INFO: The channel configured for the birthday feature in guild {guild} does not exist! Please re-configure it so i can send birthday messages!

votingReminder.disabled: Voting reminders have been disabled for you. You can press the same button at any time to enable them again.
votingReminder.embedDescription:
You have voted for a feature request recently, and now you can vote again.

-# This reminder only gets send for two weeks (once per week) after you voted.
votingReminder.enabled: Voting reminders have been enabled for you. You can press the same button at any time to disable them again.

timeFormatter.mdhms: {months} months, {days} days, {hours} hours, {minutes} minutes and {seconds} seconds
timeFormatter.ymdhms: {years} years, {months} months, {days} days, {hours} hours, {minutes} minutes and {seconds} seconds
